ast.name: Alaska State Troopers
ast.description: Statewide law enforcement. Handles highways, rural patrol, and major incidents.

dot.name: Alaska Department of Transportation
dot.description: Handles traffic control, road work, and scene support.

afd.name: Fairbanks Fire Department
afd.description: Emergency medical response, fire suppression, and rescue operations.

fbi.name: FBI
fbi.description: Federal investigations, special operations, high-priority cases.

main_content.welcome:
**Welcome to Alaska State RolePlay!**

Welcome to the best ER:LC roleplay community. Here you will find all of the information needed to get started.

Before participating, make sure you've read and understand our rules and application process.
Use the menu below to navigate.
